apiKeyModal.title: API Key Settings
apiKeyModal.freeModeDesc: This site provides free API quota. You can use it without entering your own API Key.
apiKeyModal.freeModeDesc2: For higher quota or to avoid rate limits, enter your own Key.
apiKeyModal.enterKeyOptional: Enter your Google Gemini API Key (Optional):
apiKeyModal.enterKeyOptionalDesc: Custom Key enjoys independent quota without free mode limitations.
apiKeyModal.enterKeyRequired: Please enter your Google Gemini API Key to enable AI features.
apiKeyModal.enterKeyRequiredDesc: Your Key is stored locally in the browser only, not sent to any server.

guideModal.apiKeyDesc: This tool uses Google Gemini API. You can get a free API key at
guideModal.apiKeyDesc2: The key is stored in your browser and cleared when you close the tab.

errors.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred during analysis.
errors.apiKeyInvalid: API key is invalid or expired. Please check your key settings.
errors.rateLimitExceeded: Too many requests. API limit reached. Please try again later.
errors.networkError: Network connection error. Please check your connection and try again.
errors.requestTimeout: Request timed out. Please try again later or try generating simpler content.
errors.contentBlocked: Content was blocked by safety filters. Please adjust your input.
errors.serviceUnavailable: AI service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
errors.apiKeyMissing: API key not found. Please enter your key in settings or contact administrator.
errors.rateLimitWarning: Too many requests, please try again later
errors.invalidFormat: AI returned invalid format and auto-repair failed. Please try again.
errors.rateLimitRetry: Too many requests, please try again in {seconds} seconds

errorPage.title: An Error Occurred
errorPage.description: Sorry, something went wrong with the application. Please try reloading the page.
errorPage.globalErrorDescription: Sorry, a critical error occurred. Please refresh the page or try again later.

seo.fullTitle: I Give Up - AI Marketing Content Generator
seo.description: Generate product marketing materials quickly with AI.
seo.ogImageAlt: I Give Up - AI Marketing Content Generator

step1.title: Upload & Input | Fill in all info at once
step1.description: After uploading product image, you can fill in the following (the more you fill, the better AI understands):

items.productInfo: Product Info (Optional): Brand story, core values, product features, etc.
items.productUrl: Product URL (Optional): AI may reference the website content
items.refCopy: Reference Copy (Optional): Paste successful ad copy from competitors, AI will analyze its persuasion logic

step1.tip: üí° Tip: Fill in all info at once to avoid repeating input during the process

step2.title: Phase 1: Strategy Selection | Instant visual direction
step2.description: After analyzing your product, AI provides three different visual strategies, each including:

items.headline: Headline: Suitable for titles and ad copy
items.styleDescription: Visual Style: Overall atmosphere and composition direction

step3.title: Select Image Sizes | Multi-platform support
step3.description: After selecting a strategy, choose the sizes you need:

items.square: 1:1 Square (FB posts, IG carousel, e-commerce main)
items.commercial: 1:1 Commercial (E-commerce main, carousel, professional product photography)

step4.title: Upload Product & Logo | Pre-generation setup
step4.description: In the "Image Generation Settings" area, upload these assets (shared across all plans):

items.secondaryProduct: Secondary Product (Optional): Second product to display with main product
items.brandLogo: Brand Logo (Optional): AI will automatically place logo in one of four corners

items.editContent: Edit title, copy, visual summary, etc.
items.regeneratePrompt: Click "Regenerate Prompt" button after editing to update visual prompt

items.promptMode: ‚Ä¢ Prompt Mode: Create based on AI-generated prompt
items.referenceMode: ‚Ä¢ Reference Mode: Upload reference image, set similarity level
items.textSettings: Text Settings: Adjust title and copy font weight
items.actions: After generation: Download image, regenerate, extend to other sizes

imageUtils.windowBlocked: Unable to open new window, possibly blocked by browser
